creator: mgainty@hotmail.com
text:
Build process cannot find java.xml.parsers
Which Product has this???

jaxp.jar probably.

ant1.3 is a very old version of ant, and support likely to be poor to
nonexistent. why dont you try upgrading to a current ant1.5 beta?
creator: stevel@apache.org
bodewig@apache.org
text: The Ant distribution of 1.3 ships with JAXP - all things should be there.
